sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const Table = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [addPost, setAddPost] = useState({ title: '', description: '', deadline: '', priority: '', }); const handleChange = (input) => (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(addPost); setAddPost({...addPost, [input]: e.target.value}); } const fetchUrl = "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts"; useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { const info = await axios.get(fetchUrl); setData(info.data) } fetchData(); }, [fetchUrl]); console.log(data); return (
{data.map((da) => )}
Title Description Deadline Priority Is Complete Action
{da.title} {da.description} {da.deadline} {da.priority} {da.iscomplete}
{/* Add Modal Form */}
Add
{/* Edit Modal Form */}
Edit
) } export default Table;
